forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning, then windy with periods of showers this afternoon. High 17C. S winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning, then windy with periods of showers this afternoon. High 63F. S winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 70F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 68F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 65F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
